alert.note: Alert for Harmon; Jackson (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 12:41AM CDT until July 14 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Jackson County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Foard County in northern Texas... Hardeman County in northern Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1240 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Dodson to near Kirkland to 9 miles north of Swearingen, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Quanah, Hollis, Eldorado, Gould, Goodlett, Copper Breaks State Park, McQueen, and Lazare. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
